name: cornflour
content:

a white flour made from maize, used in cooking for making liquids thicker: Place the cornflour in a small bowl and gradually stir in the water until smooth. Dilute the corn flour in a little water, stir into the sauce and simmer for another 10 minutes. Stir in the cornflour paste to thicken the sauce.
